title: Stream: Jay-Z & Kanye West – Watch the Throne
body:
So after the teasers, trailers and bucket loads of hype, **Jay-Z** and **Kanye West**’s collaborative project, **Watch the Throne** has finally been released; at least on Itunes for now.

If you’re waiting for the physical release on August 12, the album is streaming over on [**Hype Beast**](http://hypebeast.com/2011/08/jay-z-kanye-west-watch-the-throne-full-album-stream/). Check it out now.

Josh reviewed Watch The Throne, check it out [here.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9697-review-jay-z-kanye-west-watch-the-throne/)
